description:
Farm life has never been more exciting! It is your duty to collect animals from the farms and then deliver them to their destinations. 
  A new idea for a new business! From now on, your main source of income will be transporting animals!
  Get behind the wheel of a truck and begin your journey! A dozen of trucks to choose from, each with its own ups and downs. A variety of animals to be transported, ranging from cows to crocodiles. 
  Load the animals in your truck and go! Complete missions to advance and make money! Explore a beautiful farm themed world!

Game Features :
- More than 10 levels with different maps
- A range of domestic and exotic animals like cow, camels or crocodile
- Limited time for each mission
-Beautiful farm themed map
name: Animals Transport Simulator - Car Driving & Parking Games Real Zoo Park
